#summary Related Projects and Discussion


==Related Links==
===Java/Android charting software===
  * [http://code.google.com/p/charts4j/ charts4j]
  * [http://code.google.com/apis/chart/ Google Charts API]
====Android-specific====
  * [http://code.google.com/p/eventrend/ EvenTrend] (looks nice but complicated)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/achartengine/ achartengine] (used in chartdroid)
  * [http://android.arnodenhond.com/components/graphview graphview] (pretty simple)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/bluechart/ bluechart] (unmaintained)
  * [http://www.java4less.com/charts/chart.php?info=android Java Charts for Android] (looks old)
  * [http://rapidandroid.org/wiki/Graphing Graphing in JavaScript with Flot]

===Other===
  * [http://graphjam.com/ GraphJam]
